welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Augustdorf, Germany! Known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Guetersloh Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paderborn/lippstadt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter flights and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth during peak hours.
